metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8825 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A null dereference vulnerability has been found in the MIME handling component of LibEtPan before 1.8, as used in MailCore and MailCore 2. A crash can occur in low-level/imf/mailimf.c during a failed parse of a Cc header containing multiple e-mail addresses.

criterions.comment: libetpan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
